description: Try our easy to follow Iced Tea recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Iced Tea Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tea bags and half the mint into a large, heatproof jug. Pour over 3 cups of just-boiled water and stir well. Leave to brew for 2 minutes. Remove and discard tea bags and mint. Refrigerate until cold.
Add juice, lime and apple slices and remaining mint. Chill and serve over ice cubes.
